The Artist Formerly Known As Suukie sprang to his feet...he had heard
Stinkbomb's cry for help...he went charging out... "what's the
trouble?....." Suukie asked him.....
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 23, 2000 2:43 AM
Subject: Re: bounty hunters for hire


> Stinkbomb/Ramhorn:
>
> ::Stinkbomb's optics slowly slid open.  He had been unconsciouss for a few
> days now, as had Ramhorn it appeared, internal repairs barely keepin them
> both alive.  It looked like no one had taken the time to help them.
Raising
> his wrist, Stinkbomb spoke into his com::
>
<Anyone...in...the...Ark...this...is...Stinkbomb...Ramhorn...crazy...tried..
.t
> o...kill...me...in...bridge...need...help...badly...injured> ::He sent a
> message that would go on everyone's com in the Ark::
>
> ::Ramhorn's optics went open, the butt of Stinkbomb's rifle slamming into
his
